org.fcrepo.kernel.services

Class DatastreamService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modeshape.jcr.api.JcrTools
      • org.fcrepo.kernel.services.RepositoryService
        • org.fcrepo.kernel.services.DatastreamService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.fcrepo.jcr.FedoraJcrTypes

    @Component
public class DatastreamService
extends RepositoryService
    Service for creating and retrieving Datastreams without using the JCR API.
    Author:
    cbeer

      • createDatastreamNode

        public javax.jcr.Node createDatastreamNode(javax.jcr.Session session,
                                  String dsPath,
                                  String contentType,
                                  String originalFileName,
                                  InputStream requestBodyStream)
                                    throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException,
                                           IOException,
                                           InvalidChecksumException
        Create a new Datastream node in the JCR store
        Parameters:
        session - the jcr session to use
        dsPath - the absolute path to put the datastream
        contentType - the mime-type for the requestBodyStream
        requestBodyStream - binary payload for the datastream
        Returns:
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        IOException
        InvalidChecksumException

      • createDatastreamNode

        public javax.jcr.Node createDatastreamNode(javax.jcr.Session session,
                                  String dsPath,
                                  String contentType,
                                  String originalFileName,
                                  InputStream requestBodyStream,
                                  URI checksum)
                                    throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException,
                                           IOException,
                                           InvalidChecksumException
        Create a new Datastream node in the JCR store
        Parameters:
        session - the jcr session to use
        dsPath - the absolute path to put the datastream
        contentType - the mime-type for the requestBodyStream
        originalFileName - the original file name for the input stream
        requestBodyStream - binary payload for the datastream
        checksum - the digest for the binary payload (as urn:sha1:xyz) @return
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        IOException
        InvalidChecksumException
